reviewText:
My Title Review is because I already own this movie under a different title & it's from Italy.  (I will, of course, remember the title later.)  The movie itself isn't all that bad, story wise.  Acting could be better.  The women in the story are either very submissive or too strong.  Nudity is abundant, however it's more like a National Geographic nudity than today's silicone, tanned fare.  Otherwise, we are looking at a classic Women Behind Bars movie.  Sadistic guards, doctors, slave traders & smugglers.  Women that talk tough amongst themselves & then crumple like a cheap suit in humidity.  No huge surprises.  At times though, it feels as if the writer chose who died & how by his own version of Clue.  "Slutty brunette with hairy armpits by a pig in a swamp after sex."  You will have to watch it to find out for sure.
The 2 stars is for quality of the disc.  Print is super grainy with nothing done to fix it.  There also is what I'm assuming is Chinese script on the screen that you cannot get rid of.  My other print is worthy of 4 stars.
The cover promises girl on girl paradise with a little S&M thrown in.  Buyer beware of this particular disc.
